statements: SELECT * FROM biodegradable_inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM biodegradable_inventory WHERE item_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT DISTINCT item_type FROM biodegradable_inventory ORDER BY item_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM biodegradable_inventory WHERE expiry_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_inventory WHERE item_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM biodegradable_inventory WHERE price < 50;
SELECT id, item_name, price FROM biodegradable_inventory WHERE expiry_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_inventory WHERE distributor_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT item_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM biodegradable_inventory GROUP BY item_type HAVING total_quantity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_bags;
SELECT id, bag_type, quantity, bag_size FROM biodegradable_waste_bags;
SELECT capacity, container_type FROM containers_inventory;
SELECT id, container_type, available_quantity FROM containers_inventory;
SELECT bag_type, quantity FROM biodegradable_waste_bags WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_bags WHERE bag_type = 'Large' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, bag_type, quantity FROM biodegradable_waste_bags WHERE quantity > 100 AND bag_size = 'Big';
SELECT * FROM containers_inventory WHERE capacity >= 100 ORDER BY available_quantity ASC;
SELECT id, container_type FROM containers_inventory WHERE available_quantity < capacity / 2;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM biodegradable_waste_bags;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE is_biodegradable = true;
SELECT * FROM households WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY household_id DESC;
SELECT household_id, household_name, address FROM households WHERE bag_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, contact_person FROM businesses WHERE business_id < 50 ORDER BY contact_person ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT household_id, address, household_name FROM households WHERE household_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY household_id ASC;
SELECT name, contact_person, container_id FROM businesses WHERE container_id IS NOT NULL AND name = 'ABC Corporation';
SELECT id, name, is_biodegradable FROM inventory WHERE is_biodegradable = true ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT business_id, name, contact_person FROM businesses WHERE business_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY business_id;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_bags;
SELECT bag_id, bag_size, bag_material FROM biodegradable_bags ORDER BY bag_id DESC;
SELECT bag_id, bag_size, bag_material FROM biodegradable_bags WHERE is_compostable = True;
SELECT * FROM distribution_records WHERE distribution_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY distribution_date ASC;
SELECT center_name, center_location FROM distribution_centers WHERE is_active = True;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_bags WHERE bag_size = 'Small';
SELECT bag_id, bag_material FROM biodegradable_bags WHERE is_compostable = TRUE ORDER BY bag_id DESC;
SELECT bag_id, bag_material, is_compostable FROM biodegradable_bags WHERE bag_material LIKE '%paper%' AND is_compostable = TRUE;
SELECT container_id, container_size, container_material FROM biodegradable_containers WHERE container_material = 'Plastic' OR container_material = 'Biodegradable' ORDER BY container_size ASC;
SELECT * FROM distribution_centers WHERE is_active = TRUE LIMIT 3 OFFSET 1;
SELECT * FROM WasteBags WHERE size = 'large';
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM WasteBags WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT name, material FROM WasteBags WHERE material LIKE '%plastic%';
SELECT * FROM Containers WHERE type = 'bin' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM DistributionCenters WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM WasteBags WHERE size = 'medium' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT name, quantity FROM WasteBags WHERE material = 'plastic' AND size = 'large' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT b.name, b.type, c.capacity FROM Containers b JOIN BusinessInventory bi ON b.id = bi.container_id JOIN WasteBags w ON bi.capacity = w.quantity WHERE w.size = 'large';

SELECT di.name AS DistributionCenter, di.location AS Location, COUNT(hi.bag_id) AS BagCount FROM DistributionCenters di LEFT JOIN HouseholdInventory hi ON di.id = hi.household_id WHERE di.location LIKE 'New%' GROUP BY di.name;

SELECT w.name AS WasteBag, c.type AS ContainerType, c.capacity AS Capacity, bi.capacity AS AvailableCapacity FROM Containers c JOIN BusinessInventory bi ON c.id = bi.container_id JOIN WasteBags w ON bi.capacity = w.quantity WHERE bi.business_id = 1;
